name: The Science of Staying Awake
description:
You ever sit in class sleep deprived to all hell and wonder how long before you start going insane? You ever come home to find some some unidentified  disheveled  creature-guy-thing in your bed?

 College is tiring enough. You really don't need this. Unfortunately,  this already got  attached.

- very short, but branching and replayable -  roughly 7 minutes a session, but 6k words total
- choice-heavy story
- fully gender neutral protag
- vending machine.
- CG  gallery
- achievements and unlockable secrets
- a pathetic little guy

Genre? "Horror" but in an affectionately cheesy, 2010 creepypasta fanfic way.  Some romance elements. 

Contains stylized/cartoony blood and gore, violence, flashing images and sudden loud noises, occasional strong language.

Detailed content warnings list (with spoilers)
(also available in the attached WARNINGS.txt file):flashing images and text
potentially unsettling images
intentional "glitches"
loud noises
jumpscares
screen shake
unreality
mild fourth wall breaking

stylized blood, gore, injury, violence
falling down the stairs
head, mouth, nose and abdominal trauma
consumption of blood

obsessive/yandere behavior
nonconsensual kissing
light bondage
mentions of death
mentions of stalking

Accessibility features: captions for sound effects and music (toggle in preferences) optional OpenDyslexic font (shift+A) adjustable text size and line spacing (shift+A)
